mapper.select: SELECT r.report_no reportNo, r.lecture_no lectureNo, r.report_title reportTitle, r.report_content reportContent, r.report_createdate reportCreateDate, r.report_updatedate reportUpdateDate, r.report_startdate reportStartDate, r.report_enddate reportEndDate FROM report r INNER JOIN lecture l ON r.lecture_no = l.lecture_no WHERE l.lecture_no = #{lectureNo} LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report r INNER JOIN lecture l ON r.lecture_no = l.lecture_no WHERE l.lecture_no = #{lectureNo}

SELECT r.report_no, r.lecture_no, r.report_title, r.report_content, r.report_createdate, r.report_updatedate, r.report_startdate, r.report_enddate, rs.report_submit_no, rs.account_id, rs.report_submit_title, rs.report_submit_content, rs.report_submit_score, rs.report_submit_feedback, rs.report_submit_createdate, rs.report_submit_updatedate, rsf.report_submit_file_uuid, rsf.report_submit_file_original, rsf.report_submit_file_size, rsf.report_submit_file_type, rsf.report_submit_file_count, rsf.report_submit_file_createdate FROM report r LEFT JOIN report_submit rs ON r.report_no = rs.report_no LEFT JOIN report_submit_file rsf ON rs.report_submit_no = rsf.report_submit_no WHERE r.report_no = #{reportNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report_submit WHERE report_no = #{reportNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report ( lecture_no, report_title, report_content, report_createdate, report_updatedate, report_startdate, report_enddate ) VALUES ( #{lectureNo}, #{reportTitle}, #{reportContent}, NOW(), NOW(), #{reportStartDate}, #{reportEndDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE report SET report_title = #{reportTitle}, report_content = #{reportContent}, report_updatedate = NOW(), report_startdate = #{reportStartDate}, report_enddate = #{reportEndDate} WHERE report_no = #{reportNo}
